name: Tegen IT Solutions
description: Tegen is a leading managed service provider specialising in outsourced IT management and support, supplemented with a full range of professional IT services and cloud based solutions. By building strong long-term relationships with our clients we form an integral part to their business, providing management and service to the highest standards.
